rules_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If that permanent wasn't an Aura or Equipment, target creature you control assimilates that card. [i](Exile the assimilated card with its host. The host gains all abilities of the assimilated card as long as it's on the battlefield.)[/i]
notes: fluffy: it—>that permanent (Nissa's Defeat), is—>was, it—>that card
